name: Laborind
description:
Play Laborind a game made for 7drl 2018.

Beat the Laborind before the day is over and save your best friend.

Controls

Move - WASD/ARROWS or mouse
Use Item - Select item from right panel then pick target
Wait a turn -  Spacebar

In build zip there is an original mode and an easy mode ,  in case you want to see the ending play on easy, else play original and be prepared to have a rage.
